example.description: Set the variable 'year' to the the value '2006' and then use it in a header.

code.pre: <property name="year" text="2006"/> <select name="selectFADS" queryName="fads" delimit="" dir="." filename="fads.txt"> <header columnsNames="false"> <footField type="CONSTANT">${year}</footField> </header> <select/>

example.note: The variable comes into existance on the property 'end-tag'. All property declarations must be a chile of Query.
